pr_title: Provide methods for retrieving student working times and individual exam end dates

timeline.message: Add max student exam working time database query to repository
Add method to student exam service to find max. working time of an exam
Add two small tests for finding the maximum working time of an exam
Provide methods in the ExamService to get the latest individual end date
Add methods for getting all distinct working times / exam end dates
Add test for getting the individual working times

timeline.bodyText: I think the method name is confusing, it should not be findOne
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: Yes, this does not fit at all, something went wrong here during editing. I changed it now, thanks!
replies.author: MaisiKoleni
